entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 in the evening then steady. POP 40%
